item.description:
At this meeting we will actually begin to prototype our telepresence robot. This will mean different things to different people. For some, this will mean uploading and testing software and compatibility issues. For others, this will involve woodworking, for others, soldering.

Please bring in anything you think might be useful to this project - especially the things you said you would bring!

This is a Thursday to avoid conflict with the Arduino Users' Group.

Many Thanks,
Rob
item.name: Beginning Construction of our Telepresence Robot
